title: "Meta’s AI leaders want you to know fears over AI existential risk are “ridiculous”"
excerpt: "Whittaker is not the only one who thinks this. While influential people in Big Tech companies such as Google and Microsoft, and AI startups like OpenAI, have gone all in on warning people about extreme AI risks and closing up their AI models from public scrutiny, Meta is going the other way."
